title: Food Journals, Sugar and Weekends Oh My!
itunes:title: Food Journals, Sugar and Weekends Oh My!
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

This episode is from a recent 7-Day Weightloss Challenge I ran for women interested in working with me. Today's episode gives you insight on why a journal is important, how to think about it so you will want to do it, apps I like and how to keep on writing even on the weekend.
